Quickstrike ran through the battle field avoiding all the shots while
he bl=
asted down sweeps.  Though as he approached the cannon he saw
it's shields =
were already under attack. 
"No good." He fired a beam of cyber venom at Bl=
ackNightmare.
"'fraid I can't let ya do that."


Waspinator flew in his bea=
st mode through the air avoiding beams from
the sweeps as he grabbed the mi=
ssile that he had hidden earlier. He
lifted it and then looked for a import=
ant looking enemy. Spotting
Darkfate he flew in for the attack dropping the=
 missile from above and
converted to robot mode after he released it.
"Hehe=
. This time Waspinator blow enemy up!" the bug exclaimed with
excitement.

=

"Eyaa!" Inferno yelled as he burned his way through some sweeps.
Though he=
 saw Hydras becoming over run with sweeps. He charged towards
him but was d=
elayed even more sweeps.  He saw that a bot he didn't
recognize reached Hyd=
ras first.  
"Royalty!" He helped and blasted what few sweeps that the othe=
r left
behind.
"My queen, the cannon itself is under attack!" he replayed t=
o Hydras.


Elsewhere Kenzo had ducked behind a big rock and fired his fing=
er
laser at sweeps since that was the only real weapon he had. 
"How many o=
f these creepy things are there?"
